title: Some Redis improvements

labels.name: kind/epic
labels.description: Large issue with links to sub-issues

body:
### Description
The Redis extension needs to be more aligned with the rest of Quarkus, and also should extend its API to allow more advanced use cases.

### Analysis

- [X] Expose the complete Redis API - https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/pull/26268
- [X] Allow using Redis custom commands  - https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/pull/26268
- [X] Test and document pub/sub - https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/pull/26268
- [X] Add support for sentinel and other topologies  - https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/pull/26268
- [X] Make sure the current extension covers the full set of features as exposed by Lettuce or Redisson. - https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/pull/26268
- [X] Add support for the probabilistic data structures and commands from redis labs - #28346 
- [X] Add support for the json commands from redis labs #28169 
- [x] Add support for the graph commands from redis labs - #28623 
- [x] Add support for the search commands from redis labs - #29081 
- [x] Add support for the time series commands from redis labs - https://github.com/quarkusio/quarkus/pull/29615


Will be done outside of this epic:
- Add the possibility to pre-load data into Redis - #29086 
- Investigate a Redis with Panache approach
- Add support for streams (stream commands)
- Add support for non-mono-typed hashes
